alert.note: Alert for Boone; Clinton; Hamilton; Hendricks; Marion; Tipton (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 20 at 12:05AM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Clinton, eastern Hendricks, northwestern Marion, eastern Boone, Hamilton and western Tipton Counties through 1230 AM EDT... At 1205 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Zionsville to Brownsburg to Plainfield. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Zionsville around 1220 AM EDT. Carmel around 1225 AM EDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Noblesville and Tipton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 AM EDT for central Indiana.

area.areaDesc: Boone; Clinton; Hamilton; Hendricks; Marion; Tipton
